commands.name: prefix
commands.description: Changes the prefix of the bot.

commands.name: play
commands.description: Plays/queues a song or a playlist. Usage: "play [title/URL]". Only youtube links are supported (for now).

commands.name: seek
commands.description: Seek to the specified location in the current song. Example: "seek 2:10"

commands.name: skip
commands.description: Skips to the next or specified song.

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes a song by its number in the queue.

commands.name: queue
commands.description: Displays the current queue. Use prev/next reactions to switch pages.

commands.name: list
commands.description: Save/load current queue to/from playlist. Usage: "list [save/load] [name]" | "list view". Save an empty queue to a playlist to delete it.

commands.name: leave
commands.description: Disconnects the bot from its current voice channel.
